A little bit about me

Heya! My name is Nana Kwame and I'm a web developer with a passion for front end development. I'm currently a final year student at the Ghana Communication and Technology University pursuing Information Technology. My goal is to have a career that will allow me to channel my creativity through building beautiful software and engaging experiences.

When I'm not on the computer, I enjoy playing video games, hanging out and breeding dogs.

tl;dr self proclamations:

Web Developer
UX Enthusiast
Dog Lover

What I do

Design

Design isn't based on what a product looks and feels like on the outside. It includes the internal functionality of a product as well as the overall user experience. I strive to design applications that users can enjoy on all digital mediums

Development

With a solid foundation in information technology, I'm passionate about web design and development, and interested in mobile development. As I grow as a developer, I hope to write clean, readable code that can be used by others.

Involvement

In Uni, I'm currently involved in a web based application that seeks to connect students who want to learn programming through their peers. And as the years go by I wish to contribute to various open source program to help me grow in my field.

Experience

I've been doing web development for about 3 months now, and I'm always eager to learn more in this fast moving industry.
